dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4635 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 890 East 152nd Street in Cleveland, Ohio, as the “Technical Sergeant Alma Gladys Minter Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brown (for herself, Mr. Balderson, Mrs. Beatty, Mr. Carey, Mr. Davidson, Mr. Jordan, Mr. Joyce of Ohio, Ms. Kaptur, Mr. Landsman, Mr. Latta, Mrs. Sykes, Mr. Taylor, Mr. Turner of Ohio, Mr. Rulli, Ms. Moore of Wisconsin, Mr. Carson, Mr. Figures, and Ms. Ross) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 890 East 152nd Street in Cleveland, Ohio, as the Technical Sergeant Alma Gladys Minter Post Office Building.

section.header: Technical Sergeant Alma Gladys Minter Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 890 East 152nd Street in Cleveland, Ohio, shall be known and designated as the Technical Sergeant Alma Gladys Minter Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Technical Sergeant Alma Gladys Minter Post Office Building.
